import React from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { HomeNav } from "../components/homeNav"; /* --------------------------- Simple SVG icon components (replacements for lucide-react) --------------------------- */ const IconLeaf = (props) => ( ); const IconUsers = (props) => ( ); const IconTruck = (props) => ( ); const IconShield = (props) => ( ); const IconSearch = (props) => ( ); const IconStar = (props) => ( ); /* --------------------------- ImageWithFallback --------------------------- */ export function ImageWithFallback({ src, alt = "", className = "" }) { const [error, setError] = React.useState(false); const fallback = "data:image/svg+xml;utf8,"; return ( setError(true)} loading="lazy" /> ); } /* --------------------------- Button component props: variant: 'default'|'ghost'|'outline'|'secondary' size: 'sm'|'md'|'lg' --------------------------- */ export function Button({ children, variant = "default", size = "md", className = "", onClick }) { const base = "inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-2xl font-medium transition "; const variants = { default: "bg-green-600 text-white hover:bg-green-700", ghost: "bg-transparent text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100", outline: "bg-transparent border border-gray-300 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50", secondary: "bg-white/10 border border-white text-white hover:bg-white/20", }; const sizes = { sm: "px-3 py-1.5 text-sm", md: "px-4 py-2 text-base", lg: "px-6 py-3 text-lg", }; return ( ); } /* --------------------------- LandingPage (JSX) --------------------------- */ export function LandingPage({ onGetStarted, onSignIn }) { return (
{/* Header */}
PureHarvest
Features How It Works Benefits
{/* Hero */}

Connect Directly with Organic Farmers

PureHarvest is your trusted marketplace for 100% organic products. Connect farmers directly with customers, eliminating intermediaries and ensuring freshness, transparency, and fair prices.

{/* Features */}

Why Choose PureHarvest?

A comprehensive platform designed exclusively for organic farming and sustainable agriculture

100% Organic Certified

All farmers and sellers are verified through our AI-powered certification process to ensure genuine organic practices.

Direct Connection

No intermediaries. Farmers get fair prices, customers get fresh produce, and everyone knows the source.

Smart Delivery

AI-powered driver allocation ensures the fastest delivery, preserving freshness and reducing food miles.

Advanced Search

Find products by farmer name, product type, city, or price range with our powerful search engine.

Rating System

Transparent ratings help maintain quality. Rate farmers, sellers, and drivers based on your experience.

Organic Fertilizers

Marketplace for organic fertilizers, supporting farmers and home gardeners in sustainable practices.

{/* How It Works */}

How PureHarvest Works

Simple steps for all stakeholders to join our organic ecosystem

{/* Farmers */}

For Farmers & Fertilizer Sellers

{["Register & Get Certified", "Showcase Your Products", "Receive Direct Orders", "Arrange Delivery"].map((t, i) => (
{i + 1}

{i === 0 && "Complete our AI-powered certification process to verify your organic practices"} {i === 1 && "List your organic produce or fertilizers with prices and descriptions"} {i === 2 && "Get orders from customers without any intermediaries"} {i === 3 && "Find nearest available drivers for fast, fresh delivery"}

))}

For Customers

))}
{/* Benefits */}

Building a Healthier Society Together

{/* CTA */}

Ready to Join PureHarvest?

Whether you're a farmer looking to sell directly, a customer seeking organic products, or a driver wanting to support local agriculture - PureHarvest welcomes you.

{/* Footer */}
PureHarvest

Connecting organic farmers with conscious customers for a healthier tomorrow.

For Sellers

  • Become a Farmer
  • Sell Fertilizers
  • Certification Process

For Buyers

  • Shop Products
  • How It Works
  • Delivery Info

Support

© 2025 PureHarvest. All rights reserved. Building a healthier, sustainable future together.
